reviews.message:
I never have an issue with ads, I totally understand that game developers need ads for income, etc., but with this app and it‚Äôs game ‚Äúcomplexity‚Äù, it has way too many ads. 
Anytime you mess up, ad, anytime you start a level, ad. It does not need ad after ad after ad. It‚Äôs very annoying for very short levels. I would rate it 4 if it didn‚Äôt bombard you with ads anytime you moved on or had to redo.

I worked very hard to get up to that level, and it happened for no reason and I didn‚Äôt click ANYTHING. & there‚Äôs a LOT of ads. But other than that, it‚Äôs fun & if your looking for fun you should play it but at the same time ion kno because it took me ALL the way back. Zombie walking.

reviews.name: Nicky Plavenia
reviews.message: I loved this game but really there are ad after ad after ad and at this point it‚Äôs very very annoying. There is an ad even after I watched an ad, and I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs only me or not but the ad is the same exact 30 sec ad every single time! The ad does not even change it is the same ad! That is just frustrating and just every time you even press anything there is an ad. I literally clean the floor, there‚Äôs an ad, I put a design on the floor, there‚Äôs an ad, after that ad there‚Äôs another ad just to go to the other furniture! It is very annoying and I do not have the patience to play a game that is basically watching ad more than actually even playing the game. And to warn anyone who would just buy the no ad thing, there isn‚Äôt one. At this point I just deleted the app because it was very stressful and just annoying but overall without the ads it would be a much better game.
reviews.title: Way way too many ads!

reviews.name: DirtyDanTattMan
reviews.message: I absolutely loved this game for months, ever since it first came out. Can‚Äôt stop playing it everyday nonstop. Was getting every challenge, ever high score and ranking needed. I was having a blast with it. AND THEN you finally make multiplayer mode an option after having it on screen for months but could never play it AND ITS HORRIBLE. So many issues i don‚Äôt know where to begin. First of all, I can‚Äôt even get pass class F because I‚Äôm coming in last place after the million glitches, everyone is already done with lap 2. Anytime someone is near me, the game freaks out and just makes me crash and all other players pass me. There is WAY TOO MANY BUGS in multiplayer to even have any fun with this mode, it‚Äôs ridiculous. I haven‚Äôt even tried to play with a friend because I know something will go wrong and it won‚Äôt be fair to anyone. And finally the worst part is, I HAVE TO PLAY MULTIPLAYER MODEü§¨ If there weren‚Äôt any challenges dedicated strictly to multiplayer mode then I would have no issue with it and completely ignore it until it was fixed. But for me to excel in the game and get the stars and everything I need and want, I HAVE TO PLAY IT. It‚Äôs completely unfair and hope this is resolved before I stop spending my money on this game every week or so. I never complain or write reviews but I had to say something because I‚Äôve loved this game this it began and now it‚Äôs having a huge issue to me. Hope someone reads this and can agree with me. Rant overüò§üëéüëéüëé
reviews.title: FIX MULTIPLAYER !!!!!
